name: Neuberger Berman Real Estate Securities Income Fund Inc.
description: Neuberger Berman Real Estate Securities Income Fund Inc. is a closed-end management investment company that focuses on investing primarily in real estate securities. Founded in 2004, the fund aims to provide high current income and long-term capital appreciation through a diversified portfolio of real estate investment trusts (REITs) and other real estate-related investments. The fund is managed by Neuberger Berman, a leading private, independent, employee-owned investment manager. It emphasizes a disciplined investment approach, leveraging extensive research and analysis to identify opportunities within the real estate sector. The Fund's strategy involves investing in a range of properties including residential, commercial, and industrial real estate, thereby benefiting from the growth and income potential of the real estate market. The fund's investment philosophy is grounded in fundamental analysis, seeking to invest in companies that demonstrate strong financial health and growth prospects. With a focus on generating income while managing risk, Neuberger Berman Real Estate Securities Income Fund Inc. appeals to income-focused investors looking to diversify their portfolios through real estate exposure.

key_executives.name: Lionel B. B. G. M. de T. de T. S. Thio
